org.aimas.craftingquest.state
Class CraftedObject

java.lang.Object
  org.aimas.craftingquest.state.CraftedObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CraftedObject
extends Object
implements Serializable

Description of a crafted object - value and means of construction. There are two types of crafted objects:

  • simple objects - are constructed only from basic resources
  • complex objects - are constructed only from other objects

See Also:
Serialized Form

static class CraftedObject.BasicResourceType

Field Summary
private  List<HashMap<CraftedObject,Integer>> requiredObjects
          If not null, this field gives a list of alternative ways of constructing a complex object.
Each alternative is a mapping between CraftedObjects and their required quantities.

requiredObjects

private List<HashMap<CraftedObject,Integer>> requiredObjects
If not null, this field gives a list of alternative ways of constructing a complex object.
Each alternative is a mapping between CraftedObjects and their required quantities.

requiredResources

private List<HashMap<CraftedObject.BasicResourceType,Integer>> requiredResources
If not null, this field gives a list of alternative ways of constructing a simple object.
Each alternative is a mapping between BasicResourceTypes and their required quantities.
